title: Born
text: Solomiya Krushelnytska was born in 1872, in the village of Bielawi≈Ñce, Galicia, Austria-Hungary (now Biliavyntsi, Ukraine).

title: Studying
text: In 1891 Solomiya entered the Lviv Conservatory of the Galician Music Society. The leadership of the conservatory praised the abilities of the young singer.

title: Career
text: Solomiya Krushelnytska followed her 1893 professional debut with additional performances at the Lviv Opera. On the advice of Gemma Bellincioni, who witnessed Solomiya's talents in Lviv that summer, the young Krushelnytska would travel to Italy in the fall of 1893 to pursue further vocal studies.
